SEARCH
模块 Fianalproject
程序包 application

类 Robot

java.lang.Object
application.Robot
直接已知子类:
AdvancedRobot, BasicRobot, SensorRobot
public abstract class Robot extends Object
The abstract Robot class serves as a base for all robot types, providing common properties and methods. It defines the basic structure and behavior that all robots should have, including movement and reset functionality.
版本:
1.0
作者:
[SHEN FANGJIE]

    color
    The color of the robot, used for visual representation.

    direction
    The current direction the robot is facing.

    A unique identifier for each robot instance.
    protected Direction
    initialDirection
    The initial direction of the robot, used for resetting.

    initialX
    The initial X coordinate of the robot, used for resetting.
    protected int
    initialY
    The initial Y coordinate of the robot, used for resetting.
    protected static int
    nextId
    A static counter to generate unique IDs for each new robot.
    protected int
    x
    The current X coordinate of the robot.
    protected int
    y
    The current Y coordinate of the robot.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Robot

      public Robot(int x, int y, Direction direction, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Constructs a new Robot object with specified starting position, direction, and color.
      参数:
      x - the initial X coordinate of the robot
      y - the initial Y coordinate of the robot
      direction - the initial direction of the robot
      color - the color of the robot

      public Direction getDirection()

      参数:

      public javafx.scene.paint.Color getColor()
      Gets the color of the robot.

      the color of the robot

      Sets the color of the robot.
      参数:
      color - the new color of the robot

    • move

      public abstract void move()
      Moves the robot. This method must be implemented by subclasses to define specific movement logic.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the robot to its initial state, including position and direction.
